actions-list.actionItem: Pursuant to the order of Friday, January 20, 2023,  the Journal of the proceedings of the Senate was deemed approved to date.
Pursuant to the order of Friday, January 20, 2023, the morning hour being deemed expired, and the times for the recognition of the two leaders being reserved.
The following transactions of morning business occurred on today.

PN1:
        Brendan Owens, of Virginia, to be an Assistant Secretary of Defense

        -- Senate Committee on Armed Services discharged by Unanimous Consent.

        -- Considered by Senate.

        -- Confirmed by the Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 60 - 35. Record Vote Number: 1
By unanimous consent, on the request of Mr. Kelly, at  6:27 p.m., the Senate recessed, under its order of today, until 10 a.m. tomorrow.
